short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered YouTube comment assistant with video context integration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube Comment Assistant is a Google Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of replying to YouTube comments. It utilizes large language models generate contextually relevant responses. SmartComment supports multiple languages and allows users to choose the tone of their replies.

🔥 FEATURES:
--------------------------
⭐ Content Analysis: Automatically analyzes video content to understand the topic and tone.
⭐ Comment Generation: Generates unique, relevant replies based on the video and comment context.
⭐ Tone Customization: Allows you to select the tone of the comment (positive 👍, negative 👎 an neutral).
⭐ Proofreading, shortening and emojifying the text
⭐YouTube Integration: Seamlessly posts generated replies directly to the platform.
⭐ Translation using AI. Translate generated comments into the desired language.
⭐ Profile settings like default language for comments generated, reply length limit, theme (dark 🌚, light 🌞)
⭐ AI model selection (Anthropic Claude, xAi Grok, Mistral AI, OpenAI ChatGPT)
⭐ Free mode added. Check out our newly created payments tab. Now you can figure out how many credits you have left for this current day.
⭐ Contact form to submit feedbacks and suggestions!
